meta_description: We'll help you find a nice, safe and short bicycle route in Lodz and around. Many cycle search preferences, print and GPX exports. Based on OpenStreetMap data.
title: BBBike @ Lodz - Cycle Route Planner Lodz - street names
content: Welcome to BBBike - your cycle journey planner! We'll help you find a nice, safe and short bike route in Lodz and around. Please click on a street or point of interest (POI) to start the route search:
